item.title: ‘Hamilton’ Movie Sets September Theatrical Release
item.description: On Tuesday’s episode of “The Tonight Show,” Lin-Manuel Miranda revealed that the movie version of his Tony Award-winning musical “Hamilton” will come to theaters on Sept.

item.title: ‘Hamilton’ Movie Sets September Theatrical Release

item.title: ‘Hamilton’ Celebrates 10 Years With Luxury Cashmere Sweaters, Handstitched With the Show’s Most Iconic Lines
item.description: Some of the most quotable lines from Lin-Manuel Miranda’s “Hamilton” are handstitched across luxury cashmere sweaters in a new collaboration with New York-based brand Lingua Franca.
